name: Kami in my House
description:
At the beginning of summer vacation, high school student Kei finds a strange girl in his living room.
She turns out to be the creator of the universe and decides to live in his house.
How does Kei deal with this unusual situation? He just wants to watch anime in peace.

Kami in my House is Eternarration's first product.
It's a short visual novel voiced in English.
The artists were all hired on Fiverr.
